scripts.build-browser: cd game_browser && (node ./node_modules/.bin/check-dependencies --install || npm install) && npm run build
scripts.build-server: git describe --dirty > .version && npm run ensure-tooling -- -q && cargo build --release
scripts.build-server-bundle: git describe --dirty > .version && npm run ensure-tooling -- -q && cargo build --release --features embed_assets
scripts.build: echo 'BUILDING SERVER' && npm run build-server && echo 'BUILDING BROWSER UI' && npm run build-browser
scripts.lint-clippy-server: echo 'CHECKING BEST PRACTISES (game_common)' && touch game_common/src/lib.rs && cargo clippy
scripts.lint-clippy-browser: echo 'CHECKING BEST PRACTISES (game_browser) -- IGNORE js_export RELATED ERRORS' && touch game_browser/src/lib.rs && cd game_browser && (cargo clippy || true) && cd ..
scripts.lint-clippy: npm run lint-clippy-server && npm run lint-clippy-browser
scripts.lint: npm run lint-clippy && echo 'CHECKING/FIXING FORMATTING' && cargo fmt -- ./game_common/src/lib.rs ./game_server/main.rs ./game_browser/src/lib.rs
scripts.lint-check: npm run lint-clippy && echo 'CHECKING FORMATTING' && cargo fmt -- ./game_common/src/lib.rs ./game_server/main.rs ./game_browser/src/lib.rs  --check
